45a34739-13b1-42e2-8fc4-4515dcc3b501.description: An individual holding this credential understands the unique risks and liabilities of the construction industry. The holder of this credential is a licensed insurance professional who spends more than 50% time with construction clients. This professional can help clients identify and mitigate risks and manage costs accordingly. This includes being able to address pre-construction readiness, complex planning, quality control, increased litigation field safety challenges.
45a34739-13b1-42e2-8fc4-4515dcc3b501.name: HUB Specialty Expert - Construction

badge_template_activities.title: Practice a minimum of 5 years with the industry
Maintain membership in local construction associations
Engage at least 50% of clients from the construction industry
Devote at least 50% time to construction industry
Participate in deal level mentoring with new HUB individuals in the industry to perpetuate a growing knowledge of expertise to service our clients better

528e9be8-04cc-4dda-b623-93c01fea1ef4.description: An individual holding this credential understands the complexity of fleet operations. As a licensed Insurance Professional, the earner possesses a proven track record of knowledge of the industry, has participated in local associations and represents transportation clients. This insurance and risk management specialist can help others with advice on how to improve safety scores, attract and retain the most qualified drivers, and ensure compliance.
528e9be8-04cc-4dda-b623-93c01fea1ef4.name: HUB Specialty Expert - Transportation

badge_template_activities.title: Practice a minimum of 5 years selling/servicing transportation
Book at least $500k in transportation business;  Maintain at least 80% of client base in Transportation;
Spend at least 80% time spent selling/servicing Transportation
Hold an Industry designation/certification (Ex TRS, TRIP) or equivalent experience

e237dd2c-7d5e-44a3-8b44-ad2525adb754.description: An individual holding this credential understands the unique risks and liabilities of the real estate industry. The earner can assess infrastructure and implement safety protocols to minimize losses from standard exposures like fire and water to more complex issues like catastrophic weather events or acts of violence. ba8f07b1-dda4-4295-a9ed-d705eeaf137c.description: An individual holding this credential is an experienced service professional with a high degree of technical knowledge and professional capability. Each SAE has participated in the program's comprehensive, 5-day onsite training and demonstrated their competency with the material presented. Additionally, they have completed a 6-month training track and successfully met the required performance measurements.
ba8f07b1-dda4-4295-a9ed-d705eeaf137c.name: HUB SAE

badge_template_activities.title:
Have a minimum of 5 years in the industry and meet the following criteria:
Leads all aspects of client service, marketing, and renewal of book of business; Responsible for overall retention of accounts in assigned book of business and relationship expansion; Acquires understanding of clients’ business and insurance objectives and critically analyzes and compares insurance plans and HUB services
Complete comprehensive, 6 week synchronous virtual training
Demonstrate competency through examination

9f7d0953-02a9-4c1f-94d8-9567a613dbe1.description: An individual holding this credential understands the unique risks and liabilities of the agribusiness and food industries. 5a6f091d-3a22-4340-ab86-bf87f45e59b8.description: An individual holding this credential is an experienced service professional with the highest degree of technical knowledge and professional capability. Each Certified Found Member SAE has participated in the program's comprehensive training program and demonstrated their competency with the material presented. Additionally, they have consistently met or exceeded the program revenue and participation requirements.
5a6f091d-3a22-4340-ab86-bf87f45e59b8.name: SAE Founding Member

badge_template_activities.title: Minimum 5 years experience in the insurance field.

Leads all aspects of client service, marketing, and renewal of book of business; Responsible for overall retention of accounts in assigned book of business and relationship expansion; Acquires understanding of clients’ business and insurance objectives and critically analyzes and compares insurance plans and HUB services.
Complete comprehensive, 5-day workshop and all associated assignments.
Demonstrate competency through examination, final learning project, and booked revenue.

2d266881-2f57-4ea9-aa23-423965643392.description: An individual holding this credential has successfully completed the Accelerated Management Program for Sales Leaders to build the skills and competencies needed to foster a sustainable sales culture. This professional has demonstrated that they possess the tools and resources needed to be an effective Sales Leader in the Insurance Property and Casualty Industry.
2d266881-2f57-4ea9-aa23-423965643392.name: AMP - Accelerated Management Program

badge_template_activities.title: Advanced Sales Management - Includes Pipeline Management, Forecasting, Running effective sales meetings and priority management.
Leading Your Sales Team -  Includes Change Management, Creating a Sales Vision, Motivating your Team and Influencing Results.
Producer Coaching - Includes - Role of a Sales Coach; What to Coach; the Sales Coaching Conversation, Communication Styles and the Creating a Sales Coaching Plan.

Producer Development and Performance - Includes- Recruiting, Hiring,Training and Developing your Sales Team, Clarifying Expectations, Constructive Feedback, Correcting Performance and Succession Planning.
Best Practice Project - Present a project that contains a new process or way of using the tools that were supplied in the program and present it to the group at the end of the course.

98d6feca-9369-494f-b9d2-32b51889a895.description: An individual holding this credential understands the intricacies of construction financing. The holder of this credential is a licensed insurance professional who spends 50% to 100% time with Surety clients. This professional can help clients acquire appropriate level of funding for their construction projects as it relates to project completion, payment of subcontractors and material suppliers. This includes being able to address the transition to permanent financing.
98d6feca-9369-494f-b9d2-32b51889a895.name: HUB Specialty Expert - Surety

badge_template_activities.title: • Minimum 5 years’ experience in Insurance
• Required 5+ years writing Surety
• Maintain membership in local Surety Associations
• Engage at least 50% of Surety Clients and devote at Least 50% time to Surety matters
• Participate in mentoring new HUB individuals into the industry to perpetuate a growing knowledge of expertise to service our clients better
